description:
We are seeking an energetic, gregarious candidate who loves to sell! We specialize in providing customized post audit review and consulting product; therefore, candidates must have the ability to listen, understand and respond to the unique needs of each potential client. We are looking for candidates who recognize the importance of initiating and developing strong relationships and partnerships as part of a respectful, customized and compelling sales message.

Position Details

Responsibilities
• Identify and facilitate new areas of business development
• Develop solid business relationships with potential clients and maintain rapport with existing clients
• Create and deliver compelling sales message and engaging marketing materials
• Organize agendas, outlines and presentation materials for conferences and meetings
• Participate in the preparation of proposals and bid requests to potential new clients
• Participate in and manage contract negotiations, engagement letters and service agreements

Compensation: base salary plus bonus commission based on percentage of productivity with no cap or limit

Qualifications
• Minimum college degree from an accredited university
• Must be proficient in communication skills, both verbal and written
• Comfortable contacting potential clients via cold callings and emails
• Self-starter that can work well both individually and in a team
• Must be computer and software literate with current business applications
